title: Cool Funneling is back
body:
They brought back Funneling and i had to deal with it on 3 occasions allready.
Was wondering if anyone knows what Riots statement is to bringing something back that noone enjoyed except those who do it all the time .
Yes im whining cuz i got clapped by funnel-comps a few times.
But NO that does not make it any less op when i get killed by autoatack based champs like yi and twitch.
I Know its preseason but its honestly a Joke how many People with bad Memory must be working at the Part of Riot making the Patches.
For me who likes to play every role except Jungle i guess i can go and killmyself cuz Riot cares as much as Trump for everyone thats not caucasian.

replies.body: The Trump analogy wasn't needed, but yeah funneling is pretty bad. Not sure why Riot would bring something back that was clearly getting abused before it got a makeshift solution...
because they "thought they nerfed it enough"
You forgot the toplane "Chinese booster" trick of {{champion:11}} {{champion:10}}  or {{champion:24}} {{champion:10}} .

They thought that farm increasing bounty gold was a good enough counter for funneling lol. Its the same as getting bounty gold from killing 5 people after power farming 2 lanes. Riot just doesnt know what they are doing lately.
